entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
